page.title: 16Buses in our block
page.content: In our block one of the main kinds of transport is buses.An adult took us to Weston's bus station.One of the drivers took us to the manager so we could ask some questions.Ernie Wise came to Weston to exchange the green buses for 45 mini buses.These are called the Badger Line Buses or mini _link.The buses are brightly coloured. Inside the buses they are much more comfortable .They are much quicker because they are smaller.Our area also has Coastriders which are open-air buses.We asked the manager what do you do when it starts to rain. The manager said:"If it is just spitting we leave it out there but if it tips down we replace it with a bus with a roof". They also have Swift-Link and Double Deckers.Buses run every five to ten minutes around Weston and Worle.
